r.s: provides an API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers.
r.d: API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers. It can be used to create,delete and modify users and it's properties (Quota and ACL)
r.n: * API compatible with horde's Net_Cyrus plus: * DIGEST-MD5,CRAM-MD5,LOGIN,PLAIN Auth methods (inhered from Net_IMAP) * Automatically handles utf-7 encoding/decoding of mailbox named (inhered from Net_IMAP) * Modified connect to handle AuthMethod * Added createUser(), userExists(), deleteUser()
